item.description:
My other group is doing this and we want to see if we can get more people.

For our next meet up, let’s get together at the Harvest of India to enjoy their indian cuisine.  

  If you never had Indian food, this is your opportunity to explore their delicious dishes and be in good company of the group.  And we are getting a special 25% discount.
  The restaurant serves their own take on Indian cuisine.  And by looking on their on-line menu, the food looks delicious with lots of variety.   So, let’s Meetup!

 

Ticket will not be sold the day of the event, either at the place or online. Remember to buy your ticket at  http://speedeals.com/deals/1061

group.name: Cultural Caf√© - Dine Out for a Cause

item.name: Social mixer event with 25% off - come out and have fun!
